verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> now there was אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And there was a man מֵֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount אֶפְרָ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name מִיכָֽיְהוּ׃ <S%H4319><s%> Micaiah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לְאִמּ֡וֹ <S%H517><s%> unto his mother אֶלֶף֩ <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> hundred הַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [shekels] of silver אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֻֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> that were taken לָ֗ךְ [וְאַתִּי כ] (וְאַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> you ק) אָלִית֙ <S%H422><s%> from thee about which thou cursedst וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> again אָמַ֣רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> and spakest בְּאָזְנַ֔י <S%H241><s%> of also in mine ears הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold הַכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> behold the silver אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I לְקַחְתִּ֑יו <S%H3947><s%> [is] with me I took וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> it And his mother בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> my son לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [be thou] of the LORD

וַיָּ֛שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> And when he had restored אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶֽלֶף־ <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> hundred הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [shekels] of silver לְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> to his mother וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אִמּ֡וֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother הַקְדֵּ֣שׁ <S%H6942><s%> I had wholly הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> dedicated אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּסֶף֩ <S%H3701><s%> the silver לַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִיָּדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> from my hand לִבְנִ֗י <S%H1121><s%> for my son לַֽעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> to make פֶּ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> and a molten image וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now אֲשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> now therefore I will restore לָֽךְ׃

וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> Yet he restored אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the money לְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> unto his mother וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took אִמּוֹ֩ <S%H517><s%> and his mother מָאתַ֨יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred כֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [shekels] of silver וַתִּתְּנֵ֣הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and gave לַצּוֹרֵ֗ף <S%H6884><s%> them to the founder וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> who made פֶּ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> thereof a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> and a molten image וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> were in בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and they were in the house מִיכָֽיְהוּ׃ <S%H4319><s%> Micaiah

וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> Micah ל֖וֹ בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> had an house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of gods וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and made אֵפוֹד֙ <S%H646><s%> an ephod וּתְרָפִ֔ים <S%H8655><s%> and teraphim וַיְמַלֵּ֗א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> able אַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> one מִבָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֖וֹ לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> who became his priest

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [there was] no king בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [but] every man הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> in his own eyes יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> did פ

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> now there was נַ֗עַר <S%H5288><s%> And there was a young man מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the family יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> who לֵוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> who [was] a Levite וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> who גָֽר־ <S%H1481><s%> and he sojourned שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed הָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man מֵהָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah לָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> wherever יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> where he could find וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> [a place] and he came הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> to mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house מִיכָ֖ה <S%H4318><s%> of Micah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> made דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> his journey

וַיֹּאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said ל֥וֹ מִיכָ֖ה <S%H4318><s%> And Micah מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> unto him Whence תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> comest וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thou? And he said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵוִ֣י <S%H3881><s%> unto him I [am] a Levite אָנֹ֗כִי <S%H595><s%> I מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> and I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and I go לָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> wherever אֶמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> where I may find

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ל֨וֹ מִיכָ֜ה <S%H4318><s%> And Micah שְׁבָ֣ה <S%H3427><s%> unto him Dwell עִמָּדִ֗י <S%H5978><s%> against וֶֽהְיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִי֮ לְאָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> with me and be unto me a father וּלְכֹהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> and a priest וְאָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> I אֶֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לְךָ֜ עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> thee ten כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> [shekels] of silver לַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> by the year וְעֵ֥רֶךְ <S%H6187><s%> and a suit בְּגָדִ֖ים <S%H899><s%> of apparel וּמִחְיָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4241><s%> and thy victuals וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הַלֵּוִֽי׃ <S%H3881><s%> So the Levite

וַיּ֥וֹאֶל <S%H2974><s%> was content הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> And the Levite לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> with the man וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> and the young man ל֔וֹ כְּאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> was unto him as one מִבָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> of his sons

וַיְמַלֵּ֤א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish מִיכָה֙ <S%H4318><s%> And Micah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> able הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became ל֥וֹ הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the young man לְכֹהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> became his priest וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> and lived בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and was in the house מִיכָֽה׃ <S%H4318><s%> of Micah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> Micah עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Now know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> seeing יֵיטִ֥יב <S%H3190><s%> will do me good יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I that the LORD לִ֑י כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> seeing הָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> have לִ֛י הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> seeing I have a Levite לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> to [my] priest
